title: How to fix freezee games?

embed.description: Dropbox is a free service that lets you bring your photos, docs, and videos anywhere and share them easily. Never email yourself a file again!

body:
hOW TO FIX THIS?

[](https://www.dropbox.com/s/i4ddy4t24yb0vkt/Screenshot%202016-07-14%2017.45.14.png?dl=0)

B3MRLA did not accept the AFK check. Your group was removed from matchmaking.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: It looks like the server is placing everyone together but leaving you behind when accepting the match.  This is usually due to a connection issue that's preventing you from joining champion select.  My recommendation would be to go over our[ Troubleshooting Connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up for good.  I hope it helps!
